body:
We had mutating webhooks on delete operation. After updating to Kubernetes 1.11, it is failing.


I tried to debug and this is what I found:

1. https://github.com/kubernetes/apiserver/blob/kubernetes-1.11.0/pkg/endpoints/handlers/delete.go#L106
2. https://github.com/kubernetes/apiserver/blob/kubernetes-1.11.0/pkg/admission/plugin/webhook/generic/webhook.go#L201
3. https://github.com/kubernetes/apiserver/blob/kubernetes-1.11.0/pkg/admission/plugin/webhook/mutating/dispatcher.go#L77
4. https://github.com/kubernetes/apimachinery/blob/kubernetes-1.11.0/pkg/runtime/scheme.go#L484
5. https://github.com/kubernetes/apimachinery/blob/kubernetes-1.11.0/pkg/conversion/converter.go#L498

`attr.Attributes.GetObject()` is nil. Calling `EnforcePtr(nil)` causes this error. I see that the code path has not changed since 1.10. But we don't see the same error in 1.10 minikube cluster. I can't explain that. 

We have stopped using mutating webhook on delete operation anyway, since it does not make much sense. But I thought I should file a bug just in case.

/kind bug
/sig api-machinery

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: Mutating webhook for DELETE operations fail
